mapper.select: select sum(b.product_count * c.price) as total_price from cart_product b join product c on b.product_id = c.id where b.is_selected = true;

select c.pname,c.format_id,d.format_value,c.unit,b.product_count,c.price,b.product_count * c.price as st_price from cart a join cart_product b on a.id = b.cart_id join product c on b.product_id = c.id join product_format d on c.format_id = d.id where a.user_id = #{userid};
select sum(b.product_count * c.price) as total_price from cart_product b join product c on b.product_id = c.id where b.is_selected = true and c.discount = 10 and b.cart_id = #{cartid};
